Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 85th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2009...
Injured on 4/15/2011 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/6/2012, off Jason Motte (SDN)...
Earned first career win on 8/23/2012...
Injured on 4/11/2014 with a Inflamed Bicep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 2018...
Struck out 15 batters against Minnesota on 7/20/2019...
Struck out 15 batters against San Diego on 5/3/2021...
Injured on 8/28/2021 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/1/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $6,550,000 per year...
